title: FDA Approval NOT Persuasive? Uber’s Greed Will Be Punished? 8.25.21
itunes:title: FDA Approval NOT Persuasive? Uber’s Greed Will Be Punished? 8.25.21
description:
In episode 976, Jack and Miles are joined by Small Beans podcast host Michael Swaim to discuss covid in schools, FDA approval not being enough for the anti-vaxxers, Uber's attempts to dupe us, the million dollar game scam, chicken sandwich rankings, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. TDZ LIVE SHOW TICKETS
  2. 1,893 L.A. students, staff tested positive for coronavirus last week, group reports
  3. Cameron Public Schools in eastern Oklahoma forced to close due to COVID-19
  4. Breakthrough COVID Infections Add Even More Chaos To School's Start In 2021
  5. Vaccines are less protective against Delta infection but still reduce risk by two-thirds, CDC study shows
  6. Anti-Vaxxers Move the Goalposts After FDA Approves COVID Vaccine
  7. Phil Valentine, conservative talk show host, dies after battle with COVID-19
  8. Prop 22 Was Declared Unconstitutional, and It's Just the Beginning
  9. That $2 million Super Mario Bros. auction may have been rigged
  10. Our fast food chicken sandwich rankings, so far
  11. LISTEN: Bakar - The Mission (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
